title: ECOVACS Store DEEBOT OZMO 920 2-in-1 Vacuuming and Mopping Robot with Smart Navi 3.0 Systematic Cleaning, Multi-Floor Mapping, Compatible with Alexa, Large, Black
description:
Simultaneous vacuuming and mopping in-1-go: DEEBOT 920 efficiently cleans your home by vacuuming and mopping simultaneously. With a 240ml water tank, its capacity could handle the whole house cleaning. You can switch the water amount by mobile APP according to different needs. The ECOVACS Home APP enables you to adjust the water level of the mopping.
Smart laser navigation & multi-floor mapping: Smart Navi 3. 0 enables DEEBOT robot vacuum cleaner to efficiently navigate through your home and map your floorplan to your smartphone using laser technology. So you can select specific areas you don’t want the vacuum to clean, and where you want it to clean. DEEBOT can store up to 2 different maps – perfect for multi-level homes and multiple cleaning spaces.
No-Go zones & carpet detection: Virtual boundary for not only vacuum, but also for mopping now. By using the ECOVACS Home App you can create unlimited virtual boundaries, restricting the robot from cleaning certain areas. 2 times suction power up automatically, when the robot reach to carpet. A new generation of carpet detection technology can automatically identify carpets and floors, and actively avoid carpets and mats when mopping the floor.

FAST PREHEATING: Little to no preheating time, from frozen to golden in minutes! Create gourmet meals with the versatility of a temperature range of 170 to 450° F.
FAST PREHEATING: Little to no preheating time, from frozen to golden in minutes! Create gourmet meals with the versatility of a temperature range of 95 to 400° F.

title: Dome Camera, Metal and Plastic Surveillance System, Human Motion Detection for Home Entrances Breeding Farms Yard Entrances Construction Sites(4G-European Version)
description:
Support mobile phone software remote monitoring anytime and anywhere, support intercom, video, snapshot, motion detection alarm and so on.
Microwave induction technology + charge and discharge management technology + built‑in decoder board, stable performance. It is not affected by the use environment, high temperature and reflection.
Microwave induction is an active trigger detection recording, which can start recording in 0.6 seconds.
Powered by solar energy and built‑in lithium battery, no need to connect to electricity. Simple installation, no wiring and punching, no damage to the decoration.
Human body induction, when it senses a person, it will shoot immediately. Long detection distance, wide range, and sensitive response.

title: Security Camera, IP67 Waterproof Microwave Induction Night Vision Camera, 1080P HD for Breeding Farm Home Yard Door Fish Pond(4G-APN Version)
description:
Microwave induction is an active trigger detection recording, which can quickly start recording in 0.6 seconds. The detection distance is long, the range is wide, and the response is sensitive. The human body sensing function, when a person is sensed, the camera will be taken immediately. When a person is sensed at night, the white light will be activated automatically.
No need to connect to electricity, use solar power and built‑in lithium battery for power storage. When the power is exhausted, it only needs to be exposed to the sun for 2 hours to have electricity, no need to take it off and use the power cord for emergency charging.
No wiring, no need to go through the wall, no need to destroy the decoration, easy to install, no need to professional construction personnel. It can be used at home, yard door, fish pond, orchard, breeding farm, mine, construction site and all inconvenient connection to electricity Place for wiring.
